languages.text: "Вы... правы. Было бы эгоистично и слишком непочтительно к обеим нашим династиям поступить иначе. Я передам приглашение Дому". {n}Кассия устало потирает нагрудник в месте, где находится Атлас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы... правы. Было бы эгоистично и слишком непочтительно к обеим нашим династиям поступить иначе. Я передам приглашение Дому". {n}Кассия устало потирает нагрудник в месте, где находится Атлас.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You... are right. To do otherwise would be selfish and too disrespectful to both our dynasties. I will pass on the invitation to my House." {n}Cassia tiredly rubs her breastplate where it conceals the Atlas.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你……说得没错。如果不这么做，那实在是太自私了，对我们两个家族都不够尊重。我愿意把邀请函转交给我的家族。”{n}卡西娅疲惫地揉着她的胸甲，抚摸着圣仪植入的地方。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You... are right. To do otherwise would be selfish and too disrespectful to both our dynasties. I will pass on the invitation to my House." {n}Cassia tiredly rubs her breastplate where it conceals the Atlas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你……说得没错。如果不这么做，那实在是太自私了，对我们两个家族都不够尊重。我愿意把邀请函转交给我的家族。”{n}卡西娅疲惫地揉着她的胸甲，抚摸着圣仪植入的地方。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "You... are right. To do otherwise would be selfish and too disrespectful to both our dynasties. I will pass on the invitation to my House." {n}Cassia tiredly rubs her breastplate where it conceals the Atlas.{/n}

languages.text: «Tiene... razón. Cualquier otra acción sería egoísta e irrespetuosa hacia nuestras dos dinastías. Enviaré la invitación a mi casa». {n}Cassia, cansada, se frota la coraza donde oculta el Atlas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You... are right. To do otherwise would be selfish and too disrespectful to both our dynasties. I will pass on the invitation to my House." {n}Cassia tiredly rubs her breastplate where it conceals the Atlas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tiene... razón. Cualquier otra acción sería egoísta e irrespetuosa hacia nuestras dos dinastías. Enviaré la invitación a mi casa». {n}Cassia, cansada, se frota la coraza donde oculta el Atlas.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの…言うとおりです。さもなければ、利己的であり、両王朝に対してあまりにも失礼でしょう。我が家に招待状をよこすように伝えましょう」{n}カシアは疲れ切った様子で、アトラスを隠す胸当てをさする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You... are right. To do otherwise would be selfish and too disrespectful to both our dynasties. I will pass on the invitation to my House." {n}Cassia tiredly rubs her breastplate where it conceals the Atlas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの…言うとおりです。さもなければ、利己的であり、両王朝に対してあまりにも失礼でしょう。我が家に招待状をよこすように伝えましょう」{n}カシアは疲れ切った様子で、アトラスを隠す胸当てをさする。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr ... habt recht. Alles andere wäre selbstsüchtig und unseren beiden Dynastien gegenüber zu respektlos. Ich werde die Einladung an mein Haus weitergeben." {n}Cassia reibt sich müde die Brustplatte an der Stelle, an der sich der Atlas verbirgt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You... are right. To do otherwise would be selfish and too disrespectful to both our dynasties. I will pass on the invitation to my House." {n}Cassia tiredly rubs her breastplate where it conceals the Atlas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... habt recht. Alles andere wäre selbstsüchtig und unseren beiden Dynastien gegenüber zu respektlos. Ich werde die Einladung an mein Haus weitergeben." {n}Cassia reibt sich müde die Brustplatte an der Stelle, an der sich der Atlas verbirgt.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous... avez raison. Agir autrement serait faire preuve d'égoïsme et d'un manque total de respect envers nos deux dynasties. Je transmettrai donc l'invitation à ma maison. » {n}Cassia frotte son plastron avec lassitude, à l'endroit où se trouve l'Atlas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You... are right. To do otherwise would be selfish and too disrespectful to both our dynasties. I will pass on the invitation to my House." {n}Cassia tiredly rubs her breastplate where it conceals the Atlas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous... avez raison. Agir autrement serait faire preuve d'égoïsme et d'un manque total de respect envers nos deux dynasties. Je transmettrai donc l'invitation à ma maison. » {n}Cassia frotte son plastron avec lassitude, à l'endroit où se trouve l'Atlas.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın... Öyle yapmazsam bencilce davranır, ikimizin de hanedanlığına saygısızlık etmiş olurum. Bu çağrıyı Haneme ileteceğim." {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın saklı olduğu yeri yorgun argın ovuşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You... are right. To do otherwise would be selfish and too disrespectful to both our dynasties. I will pass on the invitation to my House." {n}Cassia tiredly rubs her breastplate where it conceals the Atlas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın... Öyle yapmazsam ikimizin de hanedanlığına saygısızlık ve bencillik etmiş olurum. Bu çağrıyı Haneme ileteceğim." {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın saklı olduğu yeri yorgun argın ovuşturuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
